name: CVE-2012-4337
description: Foxit Reader before 5.3 on Windows XP and Windows 7 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PDF document with a crafted attachment that triggers calculation of a negative number during processing of cross references.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:5.1.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:3.1.2.1030:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:4.0.0.0619:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:4.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:4.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:2.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:4.3.1.0218:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:3.1.2.1013:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:5.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:3.2.0.0303:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:4.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:4.1.1.0805:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:2.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:5.1.0.1021:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:foxitsoftware:foxit_reader:3.2.1.0401:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
